title: Amazon Product Integration Quality Improvement
description: Address critical issues from the assessment summary and complete remaining tasks for the Amazon Product Integration project.

title: Fix AmazonProduct Interface Confusion
description: There are two different AmazonProduct structures. Create a separate PAAPIItemResponse for the raw API response and a clean AmazonProduct for the application model. Implement a transformation layer between them in lib/amazon-paapi.ts. See task 5.2 in tasks.md.

title: Create Missing /api/amazon/product/refresh/[asin] Endpoint
description: The UI calls a non-existent refresh endpoint. Create a GET endpoint at app/api/amazon/product/refresh/[asin]/route.ts. This endpoint should invalidate the cache for the given ASIN and then fetch the product data again.

title: Standardize Logging to Use amazonLogger
description: Replace all instances of console.error and other console logging related to Amazon integration with the structured amazonLogger. See task 8.1.

title: Add JWT_SECRET Validation on Startup
description: The application does not validate the JWT_SECRET on startup. Add this validation to lib/config/amazon-config.ts to ensure the application fails fast if the secret is not configured. See task 7.1.

title: Implement E2E Tests for Amazon Integration
description: Create E2E tests for the Amazon product integration UI workflows using Playwright. Cover fetching, bulk import, and error states. See task 10.3.
